items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses. Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.
items.title: Aman-web-dev/Robin: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses.  Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.

items.content_html: stamiku Player is a lightweight, customizable HTML5 video player with a modern interface. It offers essential playback controls, keyboard shortcuts, and remembers viewing positions automatically.

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible, and TypeScript-friendly pagination utility for Mongoose models. This package provides a class-based approach to handling database pagination with support for filtering, sorting, population, projection, and metadata customization — all without relying on heavy plugins.
items.title: dakohhh/mongoose-paginator: A lightweight, flexible, and TypeScript-friendly pagination utility for Mongoose models. This package provides a class-based approach to handling database pagination with support for filtering, sorting, population, projection, and metadata customization — all without relying on heavy plugins.
